dict.acceptation: 虔诚的；笃信宗教的；宗教的；谨慎的；

sent.orig: Religious life becomes common customs, religious belief and religious values moralization.
sent.trans: 宗教生活世俗化，宗教信仰道德化，宗教价值观念现代化。

sent.orig: Can foreign religious bodies and preachers carry out religious activities in China?
sent.trans: 外国宗教团体及传教士能否在中国开展宗教活动？

sent.orig: Luther stressed on reducing religious holiday and simplifying religious rites.
sent.trans: 路德强调缩减宗教节日，简化宗教仪式。

sent.orig: Their pious religious belief enriches the dance with religious colors.
sent.trans: 而虔诚的宗教心理，则给舞蹈渲染上许多宗教的色彩。

sent.orig: Products: Liability management of national religious affairs religious affairs.
sent.trans: 经营范围：负债管理民族宗教事务。
